title: Group Therapy: Her boyfriend acts like a father to his half brother
description: Kim calls in asking for advice of how to get her boyfriend, Adam, to stop playing dad to his younger half-brother.  She thinks Adam takes on too much for his family because his mom's boyfriend left and she doesn't feel like it should be his job.
itunes:summary: Kim calls in asking for advice of how to get her boyfriend, Adam, to stop playing dad to his younger half-brother.  She thinks Adam takes on too much for his family because his mom's boyfriend left and she doesn't feel like it should be his job.
